title: Could I get my forced dodge points back?
body: I tried to ban a champion in a ban screen and it says "There was a problem selecting your champion, Please try again". I got out of the champion selection screen and lost points for that..

replies.body:
Aw snap that sucks =\ . When that happens it's due to your network having some kind of hiccup so it couldn't send that ban click to the servers, essentially the servers do think you never clicked anything since the network couldn't send that info. 

I'd first check out the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some basic troubleshooting, but if that doesn't help send some network logs over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more in-depth help!
